name: Pastel Katzen
description:
-STORY-

Luna, a stray cat, wants to have her own house. Help her find her way inside a maze, as well as collect 2700 coins within 60 minutes. An indie game, where the main character is a pastel cat. You can choose one of four possible characters.

-GOAL OF THIS GAME-

Objective of this game is to  open the gates and find the house behind those gates, but those gates can only be open if you collect 2700 coins within 1 hour.  After you collect 2700 coins and find the door, you can open it, by coming real close to it and pressing 'E'. Then you have to find the golden diamond in the second floor. After that you win the game.

-WALKTHROUGH-

-EXPLANATION-

-This is an indie game made by one person. At some part of the game, there are strong lights.
